description:
There were minor enhancements to rootwrap which fixed some bugs.

c03f247 Skip hidden files while traversion rootwrap filters
3f4d1d5 Fix os.getlogin() problem with no tty
fc04531 Send rootwrap exit error message to stderr
3663010 rootwrap: improve Python 3 compatibility
28395d9 Fixes files with wrong bitmode

Nova should sync with the recent version of rootwrap
title: rootwrap needs sync with oslo

comments.content:
There were minor enhancements to rootwrap which fixed some bugs.

c03f247 Skip hidden files while traversion rootwrap filters
3f4d1d5 Fix os.getlogin() problem with no tty
fc04531 Send rootwrap exit error message to stderr
3663010 rootwrap: improve Python 3 compatibility
28395d9 Fixes files with wrong bitmode

Nova should sync with the recent version of rootwrap

Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/47952
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/4a86c0f8b594e425eda342125fd03c0bc75625eb

commit 4a86c0f8b594e425eda342125fd03c0bc75625eb
Author: Zhongyue Luo <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 24 10:21:21 2013 +0900

    Update rootwrap with code from oslo
    
    These are all minor changes bringing nova up to commit c03f247
    
    c03f247 Skip hidden files while traversion rootwrap filters
    3f4d1d5 Fix os.getlogin() problem with no tty
    fc04531 Send rootwrap exit error message to stderr
    3663010 rootwrap: improve Python 3 compatibility
    28395d9 Fixes files with wrong bitmode
    
    Fixes bug #1231206
    
    Change-Id: I9f5faefc769fb37d37b6f093fe3a11a6e9f650d4
